title: Mock Hiring Challenge 2.0
content: Worried about Internship/Placement Season? Want to test and improve your DSA skills?
about: CodeChef PEC Chapter, the CP division of PEC CSS presents to you Mock Hiring Challenge 2.0 . It's the second contest in the series of our scheduled mock placement tests

title: CODING RETREAT
content: Get ready for an exciting contest this Friday. Brush up your skills, get on your desks to compete with your fellow coders and prove yourself worthy.
about: Top Three performers will be awarded with the Codechef Ladoos üçä, which can be redeemed for exciting Codechef Goodies

title: Mock Hiring Challenge
content: CodeChef PEC Chapter, the CP division of PEC CSS presents to you Mock Hiring Challenge 1.0. It's the first contest in the series of our scheduled mock placement tests
